alert.note: Alert for Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 5:55PM CST until February 22 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Rankin County in central Mississippi... Central Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 555 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brandon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pelahatchie around 605 PM CST. Leesburg around 615 PM CST. Morton and Branch around 620 PM CST. Forkville around 625 PM CST. Hillsboro around 635 PM CST. Harperville around 640 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
